subsection.name: blazeds-autowired-spring-hibernate-archetype
subsection.p:
Blazeds-autowired-spring-hibernate-archetype generates a multi-module maven project : a flex front-end application communicating with the backend through Adobe's BlazeDS messaging. The back-end relies on a spring/hibernate architecture. This archetype features
a flex application architecture with cairngorm
AS3 VOs code generation through Java5 @ActionScript and @ActionScriptProperty flex-annotation
a BlazeDS flex-contrib-spring SpringAutowiringBootstrapService configuration

subsection.name: flex-cairngorm-stubbed-crud-archetype
subsection.p: An Adobe Consulting Maven Archetype for generating a flex front end application : a cairngorm CRUD application whose remote delegate calls are stubbed

subsection.name: flex-cairngorm-flexunit-archetype
subsection.p: flex-cairngorm-flexunit-archetype helps you generate a Flex front-end project built with Cairngorm, using Test Driven Development.

subsection.name: flex-library-archetype
subsection.p: An Adobe Consulting Maven Archetype for generating a simple unit tested flex library (a swc)
